column4: I seem to be having a strange problem where my SATA harddrive does not show up at all in ubuntu, as in I try to say install Ubuntu to it or access it in Gparted and it is just not there...
maybe a block device driver specific to your sata controller isn't inserted
any ideas how I could remedy that? Would it show up in the "hardware drivers" thing? It says I have no proprierary drivers.
mib_k6kyh3: man uses less, and the q exits from less
